name: redux-saga-rest
description: Thin wrapper around the Fetch API with middleware for use with redux-saga.
author: Zach Waggoner <zach.waggoner1@gmail.com> (https://github.com/zach-waggoner)

scripts.start: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.build: yarn run build:tsc && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.ts dist/redux-saga-rest.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.ts dist/redux-saga-rest.min.js
